title: Patient-Centered Competency Enhancement Course Based on Nursing Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Nursing Skills and Knowledge of Clinical Situation Assessment
context.additional_context: Language domain-based simulation training providing learning experiences similar to real clinical settings through role-playing and feedback sessions with standardized patients (SPs)

learning_goals: Learners can perform patient-centered communication skills with over 80% accuracy through simulations with standardized patients (SPs)
Learners can analyze complex clinical scenarios presented in SP simulations to evaluate critical thinking and clinical judgment skills
Learners can improve nursing performance by over 30% based on structured feedback from peers and SPs
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
